#summary About ScriptMind::Links

= Introduction =

ScriptMind::Links is a PHP application for building web directories.


= Requirements =
  * PHP 5.3 or later
  * MySQL 5.0
  * A web server - developed on Apache

= Background =
ScriptMind::Links is a fork of the [http://code.google.com/p/gplld/ gplLD - Web Directory Project] and will aim to produce a link directory fully compatible with more modern web server software before adding new facilities.

ScriptMind::Links is a project of [http://www.scriptmind.org ScriptMind.Org].
